TopicTitle: Happy New Year! (Read this message for something about the AZ5 That is good!)

Articles.Content:
Well, Another year. Another end of the world story.

The 1980 or so (I can't remember exact dates) Planet X, Or Nibiru. You all remember the sun-sized planet that was supposedly to hit us all in a cataclysmic event, But never did. It never existed. Then it was the 2012 (if im correct the moon was suppose to crash into us?) And if im right correct me if im not, The moon was supposed to crash into us? Right. But didn't. 2013 Came around the peak, October 17th The Doomsday. We're still standing. Then 2014...Comes, Woah where'd they get this story? A asteroid supposedly the size of the planet X...The 2014 AZ5. The fake asteroid that WONT hit earth.

I'm sorry and i apoligize i will live up to the consequences of being reported if i offended anyone in anyway, I just thought because some people may be worried that the world will end today. I posted this to re-assure people that are afraid. The asteroids not going to hit. It never existed, Just like planet X. So calm down everyone. It'll be okay .

You're a tool for the Illuminate aren't you? Trying to keep the masses from rebelling against your New World Order. Oh sure you'll be safe in your massive underground cities while the rest of us perish when ASTEROID 2014 AZ5 slams into Terra (earth's true name) with the force of a mega-gillizion Dark Energy bombs. (Thought we didn't know about them, didn't you?)

Well the joke on you as Comet Ison was actually the Ancient Ones' Mothership come to save us from you!! HA!

And stop bombarding me with microwaves!!!
People who make illogical doomsday theories just want to die.

I'm not an illuminate, Don't know what that is even.

I guess making people stop worry is bad?

I'm not an illuminate, Don't know what that is even.

I guess making people stop worry is bad?

It was a joke.

There is a conspiracy theory involving a group called "Illuminati" who control history.

Its the end of the thread as we know it, and I feel fine.

Note: Conspiracy theories and popular hoaxes like this are not acceptable subject material for this forum.
